title: Peaceful on Purpose
itunes:title: Peaceful on Purpose
description:
Jesus said in Matthew 6:34, “Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will have enough worries of its own.”

Let Joel show you how to make God bigger than your circumstance in this practical message.

As you release your cares to God and enter into His rest, you will live life with greater joy, ease and fulfillment.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
